conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Could you please tell us why the train is delayed?

conversation.Name: Beth
conversation.Text: Yes, we've been waiting here for quite some time now.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Do you have any information on when it will arrive?

conversation.Name: Beth
conversation.Text: We really need to get to our destination on time.

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the delay. There seems to be a technical issue with the train, but we are working on fixing it as quickly as possible.
